Notes.Text:
This update for MozillaFirefox fixes the following issues:

Firefox Extended Support Release 91.12.0 ESR (bsc#1201758):

- CVE-2022-36319: Mouse Position spoofing with CSS transforms
- CVE-2022-36318: Directory indexes for bundled resources reflected URL parameters
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: When visiting directory listings for `chrome://` URLs as source text, some parameters were reflected. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 102.1, Firefox ESR < 91.12, Firefox < 103, Thunderbird < 102.1, and Thunderbird < 91.12.

Vulnerabilities.Description: When combining CSS properties for overflow and transform, the mouse cursor could interact with different coordinates than displayed. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 102.1, Firefox ESR < 91.12, Firefox < 103, Thunderbird < 102.1, and Thunderbird < 91.12.
